executable.title: Compute Quantiles from Image Data (TubeTK)
executable.description: Computes quantiles from intensity information per voxel.
executable.acknowledgements: This work is part of the TubeTK project at Kitware.

boolean.name: outputPlainText
boolean.label: Output Plain Text
boolean.description: If set, an ASCII file with quantile values is written instead of a file in JSON format.

file.name: outFile
file.label: Output File
file.description: Output file with quantile information in JSON format.
